HomePage.subtitle: for residential & trade customers
HomePage.description: Premium wooden flooring at unbeatable prices. Order free samples, shop online, or explore our personalized flooring solutions.
HomePage.floor_update_message: Think updating your floor is expensive? Think again! Explore our collection of affordable and high-quality engineered wooden coverings and transform your space without exceeding your budget.

Categories.panels_description: Stylish and functional panels for interior and exterior applications
Categories.thresholds_description: Durable thresholds for smooth transitions between flooring types
Categories.cladding_description: Elegant and weather-resistant cladding for exterior walls

Footer.about_us_content: We are a leading provider of high-quality parquet flooring. With over 10 years of experience, we offer a wide range of wood types, finishes, and styles to suit any interior. Our mission is to bring elegance and durability to your home.
Footer.services_content: Our services include parquet installation, restoration, and maintenance. We also provide free consultations to help you choose the perfect flooring for your space. Let us transform your floors into works of art!
Footer.contact_content: For any inquiries, feel free to reach out to us via email or phone. Visit our store at 123 Main St, City, Country, or fill out the contact form on our website. We're here to help!
Footer.privacy_policy_content: We respect your privacy. Your personal information is securely stored and will never be shared with third parties without your consent. For more details, please read our full Privacy Policy.

Order.name: Name
Order.sentSuccess: ✅ Your order has been processed. We will contact you shortly.
Order.sentFailed: ❌ Order submission failed. Please try again.

Description.delivery_pickup: Possible take away from our branch
Description.product_description: The perfect combination of design and durability, this type of flooring can withstand any abrasion hazards, whether in commercial centers or home use. Berry Alloc laminated products combine aesthetics and advanced technology.
Description.product_notice: It is recommended to add an additional 10% to the amount needed for amortization during installation.
